#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cmath>
#include<map>
#define M 10000
#define accr 1e-12
using namespace std;
double dp[M][M];
double pre(double remain,double known)
{   if(known+accr<0||remain+accr<0) return 0;
    int r,k;
    r=(int)remain;
    k=(int)known;
    if(abs(remain-2*known)<accr||2*known>remain)
    {
        return r/2;
    }
    if(dp[r][k]>accr)
    {
        return dp[r][k];
    }
    double p1,p2,p3,p4;
    p1=known/(remain-known);
    p2=(1-p1)/(remain-known-1);
    p3=(1-p1)*known/(remain-known-1);
    p4=(1-p1)*(remain-known-known-2)/(remain-known-1);
    dp[r][k]=0;
    dp[r][k]=p1*(1+pre(remain-2,known-1))+p2*(1+pre(remain-2,known))+p3*(2+pre(remain-2,known))+p4*(1+pre(remain,known+2));
    return dp[r][k];
}
main()
{
    int i,j,k,n,m;
    pre(3000,0);
    while(scanf("%d",&n)!=EOF)
    {
        scanf("%d",&m);
        k=n*m;
        printf("%.4lf\n",pre(k,0));
    }
}
